intro:
The Anonymous Hub的缔造者&运营者
The creater and runner of the Anonymous Hub.
影于暗
凡之凡
The common of the common.
The shadow in the dark.

post.body:
ZeroMe Reloaded改一改真的很容易让人习惯啊...
自定义一下比默认的ZeroMe顺眼多了

我对匿名的野望还不止于此
如果可以，我想改出一个支援匿名者们更为匿名地通信的ZeroMail

还是这么安静啊...
这感觉就像是在悬崖边看海一样

You may never imagine that you are marked as pedophilia just because a picture with a NORMAL you and some sentences that describe you as pedophilia. :-) 
But IT'S TRUE! And if you cant control lots of guys' mind or cant let social media help you, you ARE pedophilia, EVEN if you are NOT.

0me的稳定活跃人数倒是比之前有所下降了

提醒一下，普通id的用户就没有太大的必要来评论了，届不到的
如果0网的洋葱连上暗网更容易，那为什么不让tor browser直接拿0网的tor当前置代理呢
0Me Reloaded need a more friendly way to change the background.

IFS不再提供匿名身份了
以后AnonymousHub只能靠0ch用户来发帖了

震精，无限Hub居然滋瓷匿名者了
但老牌的[AnonymousHub](/1H51ZJ118ubwYAceszZ6CRMp4MPaSwcMh1)并不打算因此选择支持其它的ID
目前AnonymousHub支持@ifs.anonymous以及@0ch.anonymous。
致力于提供一个仅匿名者之间的交流平台

A new feature of [AnonymousHub](/1H51ZJ118ubwYAceszZ6CRMp4MPaSwcMh1): Now you can directly generate your anonymous IDs from index of the hub.
The IDs from AnonymousHub will be identified with `@nobody`.

comment.body: @14qmqyGHidimW: 做了AnonymousHub种的不论谁都能看到，但普通的用户是无法在匿名者的帖子下留名的
@14qmqyGHidimW: 其实微博本来应该更热闹，但这就是它的局限性
